name: Bloody Party Streamers
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in all Categories for all Players.
flavor: "A reminder of a bloody good time when people came together, but left screaming."

name: Clear Reagent
description: %bSlightly lessens%/b the Dark Mist.
flavor: "The Mist rolls in, traps all in its deep madness. There is no running, no escape, no asylum, except for the clear waters of the pond lost in the forest." — Unknown, Notebook

name: Faint Reagent
description: %bSlightly thickens%/b the Dark Mist.
flavor: "Paralysed, I stand in the cold as death lingers."

name: Hazy Reagent
description: %bModerately thickens%/b the Dark Mist.
flavor: "The Mist is alluring, hypnotising. I love it and fear it at the same time." — Donna's Sketchbook

name: Murky Reagent
description: %bConsiderably thickens%/b the Dark Mist.
flavor: "The Mist seems to protect us from the beast, but it is a poison, a cancer, filling us with darkness and insanity." — Unknown, Notebook

name: New Moon Bouquet
description: Calls upon The Entity for the %bdarkest Moonlight%/b.
flavor: "Better go back to sleep, there is no moon this night."

name: Crescent Moon Bouquet
description: Calls upon the Entity for a %bdimmed Moonlight%/b.
flavor: "The moon slowly fades into a smile: "Don't worry, your secret is safe with me." Or is it a grin?"

name: Quarter Moon Bouquet
description: Calls upon the Entity for a %bbrighter Moonlight%/b.
flavor: "The old moon shows her face, looking down on the preys."

name: Full Moon Bouquet
description: Calls upon the Entity for the %bbrightest Moonlight%/b.
flavor: "As the moon rises, the wolves howl, marking the beginning of the hunt."

name: MacMillan Ledger Page
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to MacMillan Estate when burnt.
flavor: "A torn and faded-out ledger page with unreadable information except for the MacMillan stamp."

name: Signed Ledger Page
description: %bConsiderably%/b increases the chance to be sent to MacMillan Estate when burnt.
flavor: "A faded-out ledger page referring to mining related equipment and other transactions. Signed by Archie MacMillan."

name: MacMillan's Phalanx Bone
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to MacMillan Estate when burnt.
flavor: "MacMillan's skeletal remains were found in the basement of the mine's storehouse. His leg bones shattered into pieces and a mining hammer lying in his lap."

name: Shredded Plate
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
flavor: "A heavily rusted, bent and torn metal sheet."

name: Virginia Plate
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
flavor: "A rusted and bent license plate from the state of Virginia."

name: Azarov's Key
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
flavor: "A broken key pertaining to a vehicle of unknown brand. A key-chain attached to it identifies the owner as a certain A. Azarov"

name: Cattle Tag 28
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
flavor: "A blood stained cattle tag identified with the number '28'."

name: Cattle Tag 81
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
flavor: "A blood stained cattle tag identified with 'Coldwind Farm' and the number '81'."

name: Heart Locket
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
flavor: "A silver heart locket necklace. The simple interior is engraved with the following: 'E+M'."

name: Lunacy Ticket
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
flavor: "A worn and faded-out ticket of paper with unreadable information."

name: P. Elliott Lunacy Ticket
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
flavor: "A pink paper ticket identifying Philip Elliott as to be transferred to Crotus Prenn Asylum."

name: Charred Wedding Photograph
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
flavor: "A burned portrait of a couple on their wedding day, the faces are completely charred and unidentifiable."

name: Harvest Festival Leaflet
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
flavor: "A washed out informational leaflet for the '78 Haddonfield Harvest Festival. A large cartoon pumpkin is depicted on the front."

name: Decrepit Clapboard
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
flavor: "A moldy and rotten beaded oak clapboard like the ones found on most houses of Haddonfield."

name: Strode Realty Key
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
flavor: A house key, mundane in appearance. A cardboard key-tag attached to it reads 'Strode Real Estate', followed by a handwritten address: "45 Lampkin Lane'."

name: Fuming Cordage
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
flavor: "A burnt piece of marine rope still emitting a warm black smoke."

name: Fuming Welcome Sign
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
flavor: "A welcome sign made from a coarse piece of water polished cypress board. The sign is charred and still fuming."

name: Granma's Cookbook
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
flavor: "A leather-bound book containing horrible human meat recipes such as the granny-slapping good chilli."

name: Emergency Certificate
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
flavor: "A yellow carbon-copy certificate which admits a patient into immediate detention for emergency treatment. Copied information smudged and unreadable."

name: Psychiatric Assessment Report
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
flavor: "A Psychiatric report signed by Herman Carter. It describes the memory deterioration of a patient and suggestions for next steps in the procedure."

name: Shattered Glasses
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
flavor: "Bent reading glasses. Speckles of dried blood can be seen on the shattered lenses."

name: Painted River Rock
description: %bSlightly increases%/b the chance to be sent to Red Forest when burnt.
flavor: "A slick and soft rock, polished by a stream. Decorated with red, black and white paint to depict a serious looking bear."

name: Children's Book
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b the chance to be sent to Red Forest when burnt.
flavor: "An ancient and decrepit story book which pages have been lost to the elements."

name: The Last Mask
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Red Forest when burnt.
flavor: "A beautifully crafted tiger mask that would fit snug on a child's face. A faded note in the Cyrillic alphabet can be found scripted on the back."

name: The Pied Piper
description: %bTremendously increases%/b the chance to be sent to Springwood when burnt.
flavor: "Betrayed by the town, he exact his revenge by taking all their children."

name: Black Ward
description: Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your Add-ons at the end of the trial.
flavor: "Hear my voice, spare my ways, protect me from the void."

name: White Ward
description: Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your Item and Add-ons in the event you die.
flavor: "Keep me from evil, defend me, and pass away."
